name: Royal Milk Tea
description: Assam tea leaves and milk. It's pretty awesome.
directions: Bring water to a boil over medium-high heat.
Add your black tea leaves, reduce the heat and let leaves simmer for 1 and a half minute to 2 minutes.
When the tea is about the boil, remove from the heat and run it through a tea/ mesh strainer.
Pour it into a fancy cup and enjoy.
